metadata.name: A Spotlight from Alejandro Cartagena - Untitled - Santa Barbara 2016
metadata.description: 'This image is part of my project Santa Barbara Return Jobs to US. I am interested in images that suggest an idea of a place without giving away too much of what that place is. I like images that leave open doors for the viewer to imagine and create new stories.' TIME x FOTOBook artist Alejandro Cartagena offered this piece as part of TIME's Artist Spotlights collection. Established to deepen relationships between our artists and our holders, this free airdrop was sent to longstanding holders in celebration of TIMEPieces 1-year anniversary. Your use of the TIMEPiece NFT is subject to the license available at https://time.com/privacy/timepieces_license_agreement.html. For clarity, this limited license does not give you the right to modify the Artwork (including, as applicable, any digital TIME issue) in any way or to use the Artwork separately from the associated TIMEPiece NFT.
